import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import api from '../api' import _ from 'lodash' interface recipe { id: number, type: string, recipe: string, title: string, most_similar: [number], ratings: number, stars: number, image: string, ingredients: string, directions: string } const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const [temp, setTemp] = useState(""); const [recipes, setRecipes] = useState(); let mainRecipes: any; useEffect(() => { api.get('getdata/dinner_recipes').then((data) => { const json = JSON.parse(data.data.fileData); setRecipes(json); mainRecipes = _.filter(json, (recipe: recipe) => { return recipe.type === "main"; }) })}, []); useEffect(() => { if (recipes) parseData(recipes) }, [recipes]); return recipes ? (
1. { mainRecipes[0] }
2. { mainRecipes[1] }
3. { mainRecipes[2] }
4. { mainRecipes[3] }
5. { mainRecipes[4] }
6. { mainRecipes[5] }
7. { mainRecipes[6] }
8. { mainRecipes[7] }
9. { mainRecipes[8] }
10. { mainRecipes[9] }
) : (
No Recipes Found
) } export default HomePage
